topics.body: What is this TerraForMars you guys been talking about?
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe44da6368721841ad0e00#post_54fe44da6368721841ad0e00
[bq="Gizoid101"]

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe410b6368723753224b00#post_54fe410b6368723753224b00
TerraForMars, the only anime where you can learn Biology and see roaches being stomp by X-men-esque astronaunts![/bq]

This.
Is a manga that tells the story about a big group of astronauts that must survive a month in Mars after their was attacked by Evolved Humanoid Roaches. To survive the roach attacks, their bodies were modified to have different animal abilities to fight the martian roaches.
And I am serious about the Biology thing.
You learn a lot of things about insects and plants!
